snippet: The case of a young girl accused of burning an Islamic holy book has focused attention on Pakistan’s rigid blasphemy laws and the state’s limited ability to protect religious minorities.
abstract: Arrest of Rimsha Masih, Pakistani Christian girl accused of burning an Islamic holy book, highlights Pakistan's rigid blasphemy laws and the state's limited ability to protect religious minorities.
lead_paragraph: The case of a young girl accused of burning an Islamic holy book has focused attention on Pakistan’s rigid blasphemy laws and the state’s limited ability to protect religious minorities.

headline.seo: Blasphemy Arrest Exposes Tensions in Islamabad Slum
headline.main: Blasphemy Arrest Highlights Tensions in Pakistan
headline.print_headline: Blasphemy Arrest Highlights Tensions in Pakistan
